sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Hello, you're watching Euronews Now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Let's take a look at the latest headlines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Tributes from world leaders pour in for Archbishop Desmond Tutu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: South Africans are marking a week of events for the anti-apartheid leader, who will receive a state funeral on the 1st of January.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: No culture, no future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In Belgium, thousands of workers from the arts sector rally against the government's restrictions to slow down the spread of the Omicron variant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And at least 28 bodies are discovered off Libya's coast after their boat capsizes on the world's deadliest migration route.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: on the world's deadliest migration route.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Across Cape Town, a homage to Archbishop Desmond Tutu, the South African anti-apartheid icon who has died aged 90.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Buildings were lit up in purple after his famous bright clerical gown.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Tutu won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1984 and battled pancreatic cancer for 20 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Earlier, South Africa's president, Simo Ramaphosa, paid his respects to the national hero.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He knew in his soul that good would triumph over evil, that justice would prevail over iniquity, and that reconciliation would prevail over revenge and recrimination.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He knew that apartheid would one day end and that democracy would come.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Tutu coined the term Rainbow Nation to describe South Africa and in 1996 led a harrowing journey into the history of apartheid as the head of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission. Outside his long-term residence in Soweto, locals gathered to bid him farewell.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: As you know, this street is the only street where in the world the two Nobel Peace Prize winners have lived. You can then imagine us, the neighbours around, we are really touched by his passing. He'll be missed a lot, played a very important role in the lives of blacks and just the lives of everyone in South Africa had a very huge impact. So he'll be dearly missed and may his soul rest in peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Desmond Tutu's impact changed not only South Africa but stretched far into the world empowering pro-democracy activists and nonviolent forms of resistance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: His funeral has been set for the 1st of January.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Belgium thousands of people have been protesting against the government's

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: decision to shut down the country's cultural activities to stem rising cases of COVID-19. From actors and performers to event organisers, the cry for cultural venues to remain open was the same. Many believe the industry is doing enough to keep people safe in the most difficult of circumstances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It gives me joy, culture, it gives me hope.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And now in these times, these desperate times, even that is taken away.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: So I'm really sad and upset that this still is happening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: That's why I'm here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Culture is very important.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It always helps.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's an economic activity, but we need it also for our mental health.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It is the only way for people to live experiences, to tell stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It is of paramount importance for us to be open in these complicated and complex times.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In Brussels, several cinemas and theatres say they will risk fines but will not follow the rules. The new restrictions come despite a steady decline in the number of hospital admissions for Covid-19 in Belgium over recent weeks. But the government says the extremely virulent nature of the Omicron variant has forced it to take preventative measures. According to organisers, up to 15,000 people took part in the demonstration and further protests are planned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The casualties of Europe's migrant crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Twenty-six bodies washed up on Libya's western coast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The latest tragedy on the world's deadliest migrant route.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: According to a security official, the body's advanced state of decomposition indicates that the shipwreck happened several days ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: He also added that the toll could rise in the coming hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Of course the refrigerator of the Homs hospital can deal with fresh corpses, but decomposing corpses are difficult to work with and store in the refrigerator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Now the bodies are in the refrigerator and, God willing, they will be shown to the coroner tomorrow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Recently, a rescue ship disembarked in Sicily, bringing 214 people to safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: For them, the ordeal is over.

sentences.sentence: Russia's Gazprom called accusations that the company is

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: reducing supplies to Europe in order to influence prices lies and falsehood.

sentences.sentence: Moscow says this year's contracts are in some cases even bigger than last year's.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But many countries have already received the full volumes they paid for.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: They say it was the lack of bids that led to the suspension of pumping through the Yamal-Europe pipeline at the beginning of the week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Gazprom's official spokesman said, There is a physical reversal of gas from Germany to Poland and apparently to Ukraine in the amount of 3 to 5 million cubic meters per day. At the same time gas is being pumped out from underground storage facilities in Germany where 47% of the gas has already been taken. And winter is just starting. It's not the most rational decision. I don't even want to speak about the price of such reverse deliveries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: These prices are significantly higher than the prices for contract volumes provided by Gazprom. All the problems in contract volumes provided by Gazprom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After Gazprom stopped reserving Yamal Europe's capacity, gas prices in the EU reached a historic high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Weather forecasts say Europe is in for a very cold winter, and a decision by Germany's Federal Network Agency, which said it has no plans to certify the Nord Stream 2 pipeline until next July, are among the reasons for the sharp jump in gas prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: London was quiet as Covid fears hit the traditional Boxing Day sales.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: However, lured by free tea, as only the British could be, some were determined to come out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In the British city of York things were also calm amid a nationwide drop in footfall of 45% on 2019.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Some businesses felt the pinch.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It was a really slow start today it was almost like are we ever going to get anyone in I mean the fact that we had got some confirmed bookings coming in and some families that we know that that regularly come here on boxing day so we were quite fortunate with that but other than that has been really quiet tighter restrictions came into force in northern ireland wales and scotland on sunday for many businesses it was another disappointing boxing day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Bahia state in Brazil has seen 18 people die amid a storm that hit 37 municipalities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Heavy rains have persisted since November. More than 11,000 people have also been displaced, with authorities scrambling to provide relief to those who have fled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: December rainfall in Bahia's capital, Salvador, was 250 millimetres, five times the historic average.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Fires in Argentina's Patagonia region have destroyed thousands of hectares of forest, authorities say.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: High-altitude areas of various southern provinces are affected. The Environment Ministry said that firefighting efforts have been complicated by difficult terrain, large distances between blazes, wind, high temperatures and dry vegetation in the midst of a drought.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Some Canadians faced a severe cold snap, with the coldest temperature on Sunday being minus 50 degrees Celsius in the Northwest Territories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: An extreme cold weather warning was in effect for many places including the city of Saskatoon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The warning was issued due to risks to health such as frostbite and hypothermia. Gullandshamn Thank you.
